title: If the Imperium of Man discovered an extremely powerful human civilization that had access to almost all STCs and demanded the Imperium reform in the name of human rights, how would Terra respond? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Imperium probably laughs at the human civilisation, decrees them as heretics and launches a crusade. The Mechancius agrees with this position to reclaim the STC’s, now theoretically this might result in a stalemate like it did in the Horus Heresy where the Auretian Technocracy managed to hold out for a year against Horus Lupercal but Roboute Guilliman as Lord-Commander of the Imperium? It’s over either crushing the civilisation or what’s entirely possible Guilliman, knowing what position the Imperium is in, showing them that there’s social reform in the Imperium, that as vast an Empire as the Imerium would take time and trading STC’s for progress. That is until someone (Cawl probably) decides they want more at more of a quicker pace and it ends in bloodshed The Imperium of Man is not for changing quickly. Social upheaval of a civilisation overnight usually ends in it falling. It’s stood for 10,000 years against the predations of within (the heretic), without (the xenos) and beyond (the malleus). Perhaps it is this lost colony of humanity (Assuming it is pure - and the Inquisition will determine that swiftly) that can adapt to the Imperium

This is something like 90% similar to what happened when Horus and his legion discovered the Interex: To keep a long story incredibly short: Chaos meddled, the Interex declared war, and Horus and his legion destroyed a minor interex outpost world at the cost of using Some of the best Astartes as meat shields If we take the Imperium and mechanicum in the 40th millenium, both entities are so bloated with ignorance and requited ethnocentrism that they would simply try to seize this STC by force instead. The end result is that by doing so, neither party would get what they want, the STC using civilization will collapse, and everyone is back to square 1
